about_the_game:
"The Latina fighting Satina in Hell!"

A Third-Person shooter in the Survival Horror genre with light Platforming!

Save your family from the female Satan "Satina" who has crashed your family's plane and stolen your father!
Use the weapons littered throughout Hell to blast your way through the demons in your way!



In Lucia and the Possessed world,
- Find the 10+ characters that will give you
- shotguns, rifles, and explosives needed to progress.
- Use your newfound weapons to eliminate enemies
- through 10 Levels in a hellish landscape!
- Finally, beat the boss, Satina, with all your skills and platforming tactics you've gained on your journey.

A game with thrilling visuals, challenging platforming, fun characters and enemies to explore!

(for fans of):

(2022) Metal: Hellsinger
(2016) Doom
(2009) Brütal Legend
(2005) The Warriors
(2001) Conker's Bad Fur Day
(1999) Silent Hill
(1998) Half-Life

content_descriptors.notes:
ILLEGAL DRUGS 
- Characters mention Cocaine, but in a way to say this game does NOT have cocaine.
i.g. "We need the flour, not cocaine" in a comedic sense. 


REALISTIC VIOLENCE
- Shooting and Killing of Demons ONLY (No human killing) with Blood Spray and Bone Breakage
